settings.text:
HomeCEU is a leading online provider of continuing education and professional development courses for therapy and nursing professionals. We partner with educators with all backgrounds and skills to produce top-notch, rich media, online educational courses.

Interested in partnering with HomeCEU to be the next presenter of exciting online continuing education? Fill out the form below, and our Content Partner Liaison will contact you to learn more about your continuing education course!

We are looking for all types of course including:

  • PT/PTA, OT/OTA, SLP, Athletic Trainers, MT, Dietitian & Nursing courses
  • Professional Development education, such as leadership training, or management
  • Regulatory, compliance, or administrative education
  • Blood Flow Restriction Therapy
  • Cryotherapy
  • BOC Evidence-Based Practice courses for Athletic Trainers
  • Direct Access courses for PTs
Fill out the form below to tell us about your course!
